Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Years” depicts his adolescence up until his entrance into the Art School of Tokyo National University; while “Post Childhood,” which runs for approximately 45 minutes, depicts his time as a student at art school, with sequences from his writings appearing in cameo form.
